text: the top job often comes with a top car
for the US president it's a Cadillac
known as the beast for the British prime
minister it's a Jaguar XJ Sentinel and
Germany's Chancellor goes for a BMW
custom-built armored and luxurious
perhaps not the words you'd use for the
president of Uruguay vehicle this a 1987
VW Beetle but Jose Mujica says an Arab
Sheikh has now offered him 1 million
u.s. dollars for the car it's an offer
that's amused people in the South
American country he first I thought it
was funny to offer so much money for a
beetle I do not think he needs it but if
he wants to sell it and the car is on
sale let him take advantage of it he
tell you he knew him the car became a
symbol of the leaders austere lifestyle
when he became president in 2010 he said
it was all he owned even the rundown
farm he lives on was in his wife's name
something his car could fetch even more
if it went to walk show it simply true
this website is hilly auctioning that
car would being a large sum of money as
I said that car could be worth more than
10 trucks but ABS or mass camioneta

he'd give them away the man once
